body_html:
just checked current master, maybe this issue is gone?

>>> import copy

>>> l = nn.Linear(10,1)
>>> s = l.state_dict()
>>> s2 = copy.deepcopy(s)

>>> print s
OrderedDict([('weight', tensor([[-0.2304,  0.2515,  0.0472, -0.0854,  0.1076, -0.0989,  0.0651, -0.2393, -0.1609,  0.2789]])), ('bias', tensor([0.0287]))])

>>> print s2
OrderedDict([('weight', tensor([[-0.2304,  0.2515,  0.0472, -0.0854,  0.1076, -0.0989,  0.0651, -0.2393, -0.1609,  0.2789]])), ('bias', tensor([0.0287]))])

body:
just checked current master, maybe this issue is gone?
```
>>> import copy

>>> l = nn.Linear(10,1)
>>> s = l.state_dict()
>>> s2 = copy.deepcopy(s)

>>> print s
OrderedDict([('weight', tensor([[-0.2304,  0.2515,  0.0472, -0.0854,  0.1076, -0.0989,  0.0651, -0.2393, -0.1609,  0.2789]])), ('bias', tensor([0.0287]))])

>>> print s2
OrderedDict([('weight', tensor([[-0.2304,  0.2515,  0.0472, -0.0854,  0.1076, -0.0989,  0.0651, -0.2393, -0.1609,  0.2789]])), ('bias', tensor([0.0287]))])
```
